name: World of MiniMonsters
description: World of MiniMonsters is a game of collecting and leveling creatures where you will reach the glory fighting in fast-paced battles.

name: Visual Novel Sisters
description: Visual novel based on the tale of two sisters.

name: Falling As Lightning
description: Plan and build a deck of cards to represent your government, then use the structure you created to mobilize the military and unite warring star systems under the guiding light of your political ideology.

name: 69 Yuki Love
description: 69 Yuki Love Allows you to plunge into an exciting and fairly simple puzzle. Your devoted girl Yuki the cat, together with relaxing music and meditative gameplay, will allow to have a good rest after work .

name: Temple with Traps
description: Go through all the traps of the temple and reach the end.

name: Chuckle Phrase Builder
description: World of LOL is an online multiplayer game where the objective is to build the funniest sentence with bits of dark or wacky humour. Political correctness has no place in World of LOL !

name: Auto Mechanic
description: Auto Mechanic is a pixel arcade game where in each level you need to think with your head before jumping. Find a support in the form of wheels and a sofa. When pushing off, be vigilant, there may be traps.

name: Desert War
description: Desert War - 2d slasher, in this game you slash enemies with your sword, use magic, rolls and your reaction to defeat enemies who are growing with each new wave, but you also pump your hero, his weapons and magic.

name: Danger: Electric Shock
description: A simple action puzzle game. Carry the rod to the finish line while avoiding the dangerous traps!!

name: Chicken Defender
description: Test your skills in this 2.5D, low-poly tower defense game. Your objective is to protect a chicken coop from the attacks of the cunning foxes using different items and power-ups. The possibility of modifying your approach before each wave leads to the existence of multiple winning strategies.

name: Yarn
description: In Yarn you play as a kitty, While playing with a special purple yarn ball, the kitty knocks it out into the world and sets out to recover it.

name: Ball Bounce Maze
description: Ball Bounce Maze is a randomized physics-based puzzle game in which you make the ball bounce around until it hits the target without hitting the obstacles, walls, ceiling, or floor. Easy? No! With different scoring categories, you can spend all night trying to get a new best score.

name: Neondrops
description: Turn your mice and keyboards into independent midi controllers or synthesizers. Use virtual ports to send MIDI to your DAW or plug in your own MIDI keyboard. Sampling functionality included.

name: Towers Inc.
description: Build and manage your own corporate tower in this minimalist take on the tower building genre. Satisfy the needs of renters and keep them happy by adding services and utilities while balancing finances. Build and manage your tower the way you want to.

name: StreamInk
description: StreamInk is a tool that allows you to play conversational adventures in your Twitch Streams. Your viewers can vote and decide how the story progresses.

name: Dungeon Conqueror
description: Dungeon Conqueror is a roguelite where you need to beat each dungeon to advance in the game. buy weapons and armor, evolve your character, complete missions and defeat bosses to achieve the conqueror mode given by each boss.

name: Diner Bros Inc
description: Join the Bros once again as they defend their precious restaurant! Co-operate or compete against your friends in this frantic party game for up to 4 players. Beat quick sequences of crazy minigames, fight a mysterious villain, and collect gems. Quickly! Before time runs out!

name: Nightmare
description: A revolutionary open world MMORPG with night-time PvP mechanics. Customize your character & enter the world of Sylvenus. Go on quests, find treasure, & party with friends. The sky is the limit.

name: Raven's Hike
description: No jumping, no walking. Raven's Hike is a unique 2d platformer in which all movement is based on her Grappling Hook

name: Lucky Joe
description: “ Do You Like Dying ?” Lucky Joe is a unique action game that combines shooting and platforming in 60 large 2D levels. Core gameplay easy to learn but hard to master, intense gunfights, a touch of humor, tons of enemies, a bit of reflection, great sound tracks… Try, die and retry...

name: Succubus Research Diary
description: The daring explorer Serena and the kindhearted succubus Nerisha meet by chance in the depths of the Underground. Succubus Research Diary is an adult visual novel about the unusual and very intimate relationship between the two women.

name: The Durka: You will (not) die
description: The main character - Mickey, returns to his hometown by the end of the holidays. As soon as he arrived at the station, he was met there not only by friends, but also by his father, who decided to hire him to work for him. When he got home, Mickey noticed something sitting in his closet - a guy in a black suit, mask and holding out a pineapple in his hand. He said he would help, but in what way? Suddenly, the city is being attacked by giant robots of an unknown corporation! Not time, make a decision!

name: Broken Blades
description: Avoid traps, upgrade your sword and reach powerful bosses to find a way out of the underworld. Enter the world of Broken Blades and let yourself be carried away by the adventure!

name: Dream Station
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sun: Key Of Heaven
description:
Post-apocalyptic action-shooter with RPG elements.

Celebrate the New Year with The Sun: Key of Heaven!

In this action-packed shooter, you'll explore a post-apocalyptic world filled with chaos and mutants. Fight for survival against ruthless adversaries and save the planet from destruction!

name: Demonic Destruction!
description: Sin descripción

name: Breathless
description: Breathless is a large, Boom compatible slaughter map for Doom 2. The theme is deep blues punctuated with cyan and is heavily inspired by Swim with the Whales, both in aesthetics and difficulty. The wad is inspired by a lot of things visually though, from Metroid Prime's Phazon Mines to Sunder.

name: ZJ the Ball: Level 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Winter Assault MP092
description: Tiger Tank 59 I Winter Assault is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 092.

name: Blaloon Blalympia
description: The new party game fun for families & friends: Become Blathletes and win the blatastic Blalympics on Blanet Blaloonia!

name: Shootin Star
description: Play as a star that has been shot out of the sky, and shoot your way back up. Sometimes when you shoot for the stars, they shoot back. Shooting Star is an endless platformer where you use a variety of weapons to propel yourself ever upward toward outer space.

name: Beyond the Phone Screen
description:
Welcome to the latest and greatest in Geolocation based Augmented Reality entertainment!

Thanks to our deal with Shivers City we've integrated the hit videogame Civilian GO! in an unprecedented way with your town! Enjoy extremely immersive events and activities while you stroll around your beautiful home.

Go out there and make your Mayor proud!

name: 断刀客
description: Sin descripción

name: My Best Nightmare
description: The quest with psychological horror elements, nice pixel art, and a non-linear story.

name: Fake Hostel
description: Fake Hostel this is exciting, puzzle game with Fancy Girls. Control your tube and find the way to pass the level and unlock a lot of beauty in the gallery

name: Kingdom of Assetia: The Clicker Game
description: In Kingdom of Assetia: The Clicker Game you'll be assuming the role of the Mayor of Anywhere. After a disastrous flood hit the former prime adventuring hub you'll be working on restoring the village.

name: Eternal Warfare
description: Eternal Warfare is a turn-based strategy and war game where you harvest resources, build an army, and then destroy your opponents! Starting with a single building, construct production facilities, advance your tech level, and then fight through land, sea and air, until you emerge victorious!

name: Verdict
description: Establish your written character in a world of many. Craft, fight, and befriend your way to the top against real players, all of which have their own goals and their own motives. Become the leader of a country- slay titans- create new magic- and more.

name: Unnatural Freaks: Episode 1 Wolf At Evergreen
description: A supernatural-mystery, interactive-narrative VR experience. Are the rumours of a werewolf sighting true? Talk with townspeople and explore the museum to discover what's truly happening in the small town of Evergreen.

name: Night Darkness
description: You have to take control of one of the most famous mercenaries and complete a special mission to save humanity from certain death.

name: Angel's Tale: An extraordinary love story
description: Studio GU's very first Visual Novel. This is the story of "Prach". The protagonist of the story is a young man with special powers to see the supernatural. He must find himself in the middle of a conflict between an "angel" and a "devil", both seemingly targeting him.

name: Heads Will Roll
description: Combination of survival RPG and dating sim that lets you play as young medieval soldier who over the course of wars and adventures becomes the most formidable and respected knight of his era. And hopefully finds the love of his life. Or, if he’s not lucky enough, perishes in the chaos of war

name: Punkgrad
description: Punkgrad - is a fast-paced 3d platformer. You will become a punk, who has to fight with a lot of enemies in different dimensions using various weapons!

name: Red Square Escape 2
description: Red square escape 2 is the sequel to the beloved difficult top down 2D movement game where you are the red square and have to escape through different levels. Each level is spiked with traps and obstacles you need to overcome. Simple controls, simple art style and simple fun are guaranteed here. Have you got the skills to escape?

name: From Earth to Heaven
description: In this game, you follow the protagonist who initially fell from heaven back into the sky. The game is a unique combination of a first-person platformer and a light-hearted exploration game with an almost philosophical story-telling. It is highly stylized and surprises with breathtaking environments, a surreal world full of beauty and grace, and a couple of small environmental puzzles that blend perfectly into the peaceful yet stunning environments. Will you be able to make it back into heaven? Find it out.

name: Submerged Gallery
description: Explore a virtual gallery of submechanophobia in a retro computing environment.

name: Disaster Quest Tree
description: Sin descripción

name: The Mean Green 2
description:
The first 3 maps saw you fighting against Imps, Sergeants and Demons with only the Shotgun, Chaingun and the Rocket Launcher. This time they are cranked up to 11 and you're gonna get bigger guns. But also a whole lot of beefier meat to aim them at! You are the Mean Green and you are about to bully the crap out of this strange world!
The levels are medium sized and sets the player in an abstract semi realistic hellish tech setting.

name: Herschel Spaceport
description: Here's a short techbase map set in Herschel Crater, on Saturn's moon, Mimas. The UAC has set up a space colony overrun by demons. What could the UAC have hidden under the Miman soil to warrant such an invasion?

name: Super Mario Moonlite World
description:
This mod is a compilation of levels and other assets originally intended for 'Super Mario Moonlight World', thus making it a 'Lite' version, this includes:
- 15 Moonlit levels each more unique than the last
- Dozens of custom tilesets
- An almost entirely original soundtrack to fit the nighttime vibe
- Several custom backgrounds
- Plenty of remodels and retextures of in-game objects, including Odyssey-like moons to collect

name: Aston May Die
description:
Esthiru, a 24-year-old truck driver, is waiting for their friend Aston to arrive so they can play fighting games. But what waits for them is more than that.

Aston May Die is a piece of yuri interactive fiction about being in love with someone that is dying and about not caring about that, living in the moment.

name: Tiny Town Mail
description: It's your first day on the job, and you have several packages to deliver, but all of the labels are smudged! Get to know the folks of Tiny Town and try to figure out who ordered what in this small and simple puzzle game.

name: Type the Entire of Ulysses. That's It. That's the Game.
description: Finally, a typing game with the entire of James Joyce's Ulysses in it. In "Type The Entire Of Ulysses. That's It. That's The Game." you will type out Ulysses and pretty much nothing else.

name: Super Taco Crew
description: A Fox Thief Survives in a Dark City

name: Robosnow
description: Robosnow is a casual racing game. Collect bonuses to increase your speed. Challenge yourself in a new personal record time with precise turns and obstacle avoidance.

name: The Cruel kings
description: The Cruel kings is a top-down game in which you must either kill or survive. Each round starts with a split screen. The goal of the players is to destroy each other in 1 minute. There are also coins. If the players have an equal amount of life, then the one who collected the most coins wins.

name: Deathly Stillness
description: The appearance of zombie, broke the quiet life, the only way is to eliminate them! Watch your bullet count Killing a single zombie will make it easy for you to complete the task, but surrounded by zombies will kill you

name: Tower Stacker
description: Build a huge tower! how far can you go? Try not to miss, and build the highest building in the city!

name: Wild West Rogue
description: Wild West Rogue is a Top Down shooter game in which you need to shoot back from enemies, dodge traps, flying projectiles, look for ways out of intricate mazes and pump up your skills with the help of ancient power.

name: Eyeballs are your Enemies!
description: Don't let The RulerEye establish his new reign of terror! Eliminate all eyes, collect the rewards and achieve new records!

name: Let Me Die inside
description: The characters of Let Me Die (inside) have fallen into despair head over heels, so they want to leave this world and end their lives. Your duty is to fulfil their wish. In every level, the player is expected to find a way to die, but before that, he has to complete the death wishes of the character.

name: To the Max
description: An entertainingly reckless true-story visual novel about working at a real video arcade in 1998.

name: Macaroni in a Pot
description:
Experience the thrilling world of PRO PASTA COOKING!

Learn the secret techniques behind making mediocre Mac'n'Cheese from the comfort of your own computation device!

name: Carnage Oasis
description: Carnage Oasis is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. This month's project lead is 40oz.

name: Tokyo Love Hustle
description: Otome game by Voltage.

name: Your Voice in the Autumn Leaves
description: After his girlfriend Kaori broke up with him, 17 year old student Kure isolated himself from the world, spending his time home, heartbroken, listening to sad indie songs and playing videogames. Then, one day, outside the Hospital where his mother works, Kure met someone very special: a girl named Autumn, who has been diagnosed with cancer and is trying to assimilate her situation. That day would change their lives forever...

name: Kamisama: Spirit of the Shrine
description:
When you accidentally damage a Shinto shrine, you’re forced to pay off your debt by becoming a miko to the handsome spirits who live there—an irritable god, sly fox familiar, and energetic lion-dog guardian.

Just as you’re starting to settle into your bizarre new life, an ancient, terrifying demon awakens from his long slumber. Can you work together with your allies to repel this ancient evil, or is the town doomed to suffer the same fate it did 500 years ago?

Embark on an epic Japanese adventure to save the shrine and uncover deep secrets buried in the past. Discover and harness your spiritual power to protect your friends, all the while shaping your love story into a tale for the ages!

name: Goodnight
description: A short kinetic novel about a nameless boy who expresses his thoughts under the gentle shine of the night sky.

name: Horror Break: Head to Head
description: Horror Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated fantasy items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Totemlands
description: You are an adventurer who just arrived at the mysterious land of Oakshade, inhabited by spirits known as Oaklingers, peculiar locals and… totems? Totemlands is a relaxing crafting, building game where you hunt spirits, use them to craft and raise totem poles. Totem poles produce valuable resources called Relics, which can be sold for Golden Acorns (in-game currency). which later can be used to expand, upgrade or unlock new territories.

name: Hyper Cards
description:
If you are obsessed with collecting all the cards, then Hyper Cards is the perfect game for you.
Rip out the cards from their packs and see which character is hidden in it!
You can trade your cards with other to complete your pack but be careful… you don’t want to be scammed by your competition!

name: Quake: Alkaline Jam
description: Nine large, open industrial/base levels and a starting hub map. The underlying mod features a large number new and modified enemies, weapons and additional content like models, sounds, skyboxes and music tracks for each map. It is also meant to serve as a general toolbox for base-themed levels.

name: Zen Pinball Party
description: Zen Pinball Party delivers the ultimate pinball experience with carefully crafted tables that are inspired by some of the biggest brands from DreamWorks Animation and Hasbro, as well as popular pinball classic themes. Players will challenge their friends and family for the highest score on fun and unique tables.

name: Randy and Teddy Adventure Road
description: A puzzle 2.5D platformer where Randy, main character, and Teddy, his pup go on an amazing adventure road! Go with them and travel to 5 different worlds where you'll meet pesky robots that will make this journey hard. Solve challenging puzzles and earn stars and achievements as you go!

name: Broken World
description: An Action Adventure RPG where the player explores 4 different islands to light 4 different beacons of power - The Fire Monuments. While exploring these areas, the player will encounter puzzles, combat challenges, and will have to use their different abilities to reach the end.

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - Digital Deluxe
description: Join Sonic in the high-speed adventure of a lifetime in Sonic Colors: Ultimate! Digital Deluxe includes the Ultimate Cosmetic Pack and the Ultimate Music Pack. Color the Universe!

name: Active Life Outdoor Challenge
description:
Get ready to take on the great outdoors anywhere because ACTIVE LIFE Outdoor Challenge is back on the Nintendo Switch! From kayaking to obstacle-filled races, you will engage in real-life exercises to complete a variety of fun minigames. Improve your hand-eye coordination and work up a sweat with the Joy-Con and Leg Strap!
Play over a dozen single and multiplayer challenges. Simple controls allow for easy-to-pick up games that anyone can enjoy. With ACTIVE LIFE Outdoor Challenge, you can bring the adventure wherever you go!

name: Mart and Tetra
description: "I will make you Hero"...A weak girl adventurer who was tricked with a proposal and a girl ex-Demon king. Switch these two to defeat the Demon king(or Hero)

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Miraculous Dream - Collector's Edition
description: Who’s the fairest of them all?

name: Clarence Goes to the F%ing Store
description: An absurdist comedy choose-your-own-adventure game featuring a massive cast of bizarre characters, notebook-doodle visuals, and 7 crazy endings! As you embark on your quest to go to the store, the denizens of this zany town will seek your help with their insane problems.

name: Drowned Helicopter
description: Drowned Helicopter is a 2d side-scroller game in which the player controls a helicopter, rescuing residents from flooding, dodging tall buildings, flying debris, and escaping from a downpour, he must be able to survive to the end.

name: Imaginary Realms Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:
- Endless Fables 4: Shadow Within
- My Brother Rabbit
- Dreamwalker: Never Fall Asleep

name: The Medium + Observer: System Redux + Darq: Complete Edition Bundle
description: The Ultimate Horror Bundle. Use your psychic abilities to uncover the disturbing secrets of The Medium, become a neural police detective in the dark cyberpunk world of Observer: System Redux, and bend gravity inside the lucid nightmares of DARQ: Complete Edition.

name: Two Hundred Ways
description: 200 tricky levels to solve in Two Hundred Ways. The goal is to make the ball(s) reach its goal(s). That will be hard because of up to three layers and a lot of traps. To finish the levels, you have some resources but only a limited budget. Think outside the box to have benefits.

name: Theatre of War
description: Engage your opponent in this unique real-time strategy game set on a surreal tile-based board game battlefield. Clash swords and fire arrows in the Medieval style, roll tanks to victory in the Great War setting, and gain air superiority in the Contemporary mode.

name: Pixasso 3
description: "PIXASSO 3" - is a final chapter of relaxing franchise for lovers of the coloring pixel art. New game mode! New colors! New pictures! Have fun!

name: Above the Skies
description: Dylan is the head of a small village and captain of The Eagle and he takes it upon himself to find The Grail and stop the Falls, saving those he cares for. The journey will be long and perilous, but the whole world above the skies depends on it.

name: Hidden Object: Detective Holmes - Heirloom
description: Arthur Conan Doyle's detectives are conducting a new investigation! Train your brain with the best classic hidden object detective game!

name: Dice of Knights
description: Roll the dice, swing the sword and let the magic talk!

name: Airplane Tycoon
description: Manage your own air company! Be a businessman in the air industry, with control over everything in your business. Work, earn, grow and become an air transport tycoon!

name: You Must
description: In the social network, the main character plays the quest "Hide and Seek", but this time the organizers decided to move the quest to the real world. They indicate the coordinates of the place where the quest item was hidden, the one who finds it first will receive a cash prize.

name: Mini Island: Autumn
description: Mini Island: Autumn is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: Tag Royale
description: A classic game of Tag with a battle royale twist. Everyone is your friend until they are IT. I hope you enjoy the views but be worried about those who are around you. They may betray you while using a power-up that can tag you and eliminate you from the game

name: First Land
description: A story of human connection.

name: Grandmaster Chess
description: Whether you’re a beginner or a veteran, this fully featured chess game from Capstone has all the tools and features you need to learn and master the game of chess. Challenge an opponent with five adjustable skill levels from beginner to grandmaster.

name: Endless Becoming: Apartment
description: It is an interactive virtual art installation. Utilizing Virtual Reality or First Person modes, users are encouraged to explore at their own pace. Users will experience an unfolding landscape of architecture, spatialized sound and digital phenomena.

name: Endless Fables: Shadow Within
description: All their childhood, Pamela and Hans' sister - Agatha - tried to convince adults about what had happened to Hans, but unfortunately terrifying truth was taken for childish imagination and silly nightmares. In time, both friends began to doubt their own memory and accepted the thought that Hans was dead. That is, until Pamela receives a letter from Agatha. Friend convinces Pamela, that Hans managed to contact her recently. Without hesitation, Miss Cavendish returns to the town of Mittenwald to finally close the most painful chapter of her life. And so, in a quiet town where nothing bad has happened for years, she will encounter a mystery in which dreams mingle with reality. Every step she takes will be watched by a shadow behind the mirror. Will she get to the nightmare realm where Hans is still fighting for his life? Will she be able to stop the mysterious figure hidden in the shadows? And will she risk everything in the fight for the safety of her friends?

name: Pippu: Bauble Quest
description: Pippu is a heroic little creature from the world of the Beandrops. One day her planet is visited by hostile aliens called the Obkins, who travel from place to place stealing precious treasures to power their dangerous and wacky machinery. Run, climb and swim your way through 14 worlds to bash the baddies and save your planet. Features: Colorful, vibrant worlds with lots of nooks and crannies to explore. A kooky cast of weird and wonderful characters to meet. Collect all 56 Baubles to restore your world to its full glory. Fun for all the family, young and old, beginner or seasoned gamer.

name: Prinny Presents: NIS Classics Vol 1 - Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition includes:

- Prinny Presents NIS Classics Volume 1
- Complete Soundtrack
- Hardcover Artbook
- Acrylic Stand with Collector's Coin
- Box

name: MasterChef: Let's Cook
description: Do you have what it takes to be the number one chef? Show your cooking abilities in MasterChef: Let’s Cook! A unique, fun, and fast-paced cooking competition game awaits you! Get matched with other players around the globe. Choose your ingredients, slice, prepare, plate, and serve delicious dishes with style in fun mini-games! The MasterChef jury will evaluate your dish based on your performance and speed. Complete and unlock new recipes, challenges, mini-games along your cooking journey!

name: No!Ah!'s Ark
description: No!Ah!'s Ark is an advanced Whac-A-Mole game. The Big flood came and the world was destroyed. You're the chosen one, Noah. You have to save the animals and the girl you love.

name: Virus ON
description: Virus ON - is a colourful 2D platformer with the simplest gameplay where you have to do various levels playing as a monster saving the world by eating tasty molecules.

name: Planetarian: Ultimate Edition
description: Planetarian: Ultimate Edition features the 2016's 'planetarian HD' remaster, a kinetic novel based on a short light novel 'Snow Globe', four Drama CDs, and an art book.

name: planetarian: Snow Globe
description: Planetarian: Snow Globe is a kinetic novel based on a short light novel by the same name that occurs before the events of Planetarian: The Reverie of a Little Planet.

name: Succubus: Hunt For Meal
description: Succubus: Hunt for Meal is a hentai puzzle game for adults, where your goal is to consume all the life force of all the enemies our protagonist encounter. This game aims to make you relax and have fun with original and handmade arts.

name: The Medium: Two Worlds Special Edition
description:
The Medium: Two Worlds Special Edition contains:

The game
Exclusive SteelBook
Soundtrack of the game
32-page hardcover artbook

name: Big Rumble Boxing: Creed Champions - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Four color jumps
description: "Four color jump" is an easy jump game. Players need to click the mouse to get the object in the middle of the screen to the end through the same color obstacle. The difficulty will gradually increase.

name: Riotous
description: Riotous Is a Third-Person Shooter supporting cross platform play, players battle on 32 player maps in a variety of environments and settings.

name: Moonlight Princess
description: Moonlight Princess is a massively multiplayer experience that merges class based PvPvE and roguelite elements. Unlock classes as you grow stronger and progress your character.

name: Theme Park Simulator: Collector's Edition
description:
Theme Park Simulator, amazing amusement park simulator game is here! Different simulators are waiting for you: roller coasters, inverter, bumper cars, tagada... Simulators for everyone!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Base Game: Theme Park Simulator
- Technical Book
- Rides Cards
- Park Map
- Tickets
- Bracelet

name: No Umbrellas Allowed
description: Reveal the true value of the items coming into the shop. Each item has their own history. Dig deep to see what is behind them and become an expert appraiser. Begin a tug of war with customers. With their own expectations and knowledge, they never give up on money.

name: The Endless Summer: Search For Surf
description: Open World Two Player 3D Surfing Physics Game. Learn to surf, explore the tropical islands by jet ski or land, find new surf spots, challenge your friends to a contest.

name: Making it Home
description: You’re a ladybug building a marvellous contraption to travel from one side of America to the other. Bounce around your vehicle, hoisting sails, squeezing bellows, and spinning propellers. How will you make it home?

name: Dottie Dreads Nought
description:
Dottie Dreads Nought is a platforming game created for the SNESDEV Game Jam 2021.

Can you help Dottie on her hiking adventure to find the legendary Edelweiß flower?

Along for the ride is her friend Ernesto. By using the magic mirror, you can shift perspective to him and reveal secrets previously hidden.

name: Nullscape
description:
The End is a barren, depressing, bleak place. As it should be, and always will be.

Nullscape is a Minecraft datapack designed to overhaul the End's generation in a way that maintains this identity - a realm of utter desolation. Nullscape will make you feel tiny and alone in the vast expanse of the End. You against the void - nothing more than that.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Enhanced Edition
description: Embark on a journey to a realm overrun by demons in a new epic RPG from the creators of Pathfinder: Kingmaker. Explore the nature of good and evil, learn the true cost of power, and rise as a Mythic Hero capable of deeds beyond mortal expectations.

name: El Shaddai: Ascension of the Metatron
description: El Shaddai: Ascension of the Metatron, originally released in 2011, is a unique third-person action adventure filled with a deeply artistic world-building, outstanding aesthetics and thrilling battles.

name: Encounters: Music Stories
description:
Encounters: Music Stories tells us about the desires of its characters to meet and be happy with their loved ones. Do you want to know how these stories end? You will have to be precise and let yourself be carried away by its wonderful music.

Each character plays a part of the musical piece. To advance you will only have to go down the blue tiles at the right time and live the experience of synchronizing with the instruments of precious melodies.

name: Broken Bird: Spread Your Wings
description: Brave a storm to get supplies for a injured stranger who cannot comprehend why you are helping them.

name: Container City
description: Build eco-friendly habitats on the sea out of containers and solar panels. Welcome to the city of the future!

name: Arcade Archives: USAAF Mustang
description: USAAF Mustang is a shooter released by UPL in 1990. Players pilot a plane and take on enemy squadrons. Use power-up items to enhance your weapons and gain the advantage as you clear stages. The key to victory is the Strike Forcer attack, which makes you temporarily invincible in a pinch while continuing your attacks on enemies.

name: Chunithm Super Star Plus
description: The append version of Chunithm Super Star Plus (Standalone Expansion). It has launched Sep 2, 2021 via Online Update. Added the new features: Course Mode, World's End.

name: Tiger Striker: MP079
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 079.

name: Tiger Striker: MP072
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 072.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora! MP041
description: The game's system is somewhere between air combat and naval warfare. It's a lot like the old game I played as a kid, and we control fighters to destroy the enemy's fleet. Feature:The DLC include mission pack 041

name: Tiger Fighter 1931: Tora!Tora! MP036

description: Tiger Soldier is a military-themed run & gun shooter game. Playing as a lone soldier, first by fighting off infantry units and battling tanks then lob a hand grenade into the enemy's fort. Destroy the enemy's fort to clear game. The DLC include mission pack 045.

name: Elated Sorrow
description: A yuri kinetic novel about two lonely women who meet by chance.

name: Pam's House: An Escape Game
description: Here's a charming, escape-room puzzle game with hand-drawn art!

name: Working Tidal
description:
Working Tidal is a Sega Dreamcast inspired, loot grabbing, time attack game built for Haunted PS1's Summer of Shivers game jam.

In it, you'll be given control of a submarine with a limited fuel supply and tasked with diving into various oceanic locations for lost, forgotten, and valuable artifacts as part of a gig for a salvage company.

You can return to locations you've previously unlocked, upgrade your submarine, and view detailed descriptions and models of the items you've found in-game from the main menu.

There are several locations to explore, as well as some narrative segments to see. Total runtime should come in at under an hour, unless you really enjoy your new job.

name: Space Hero 50
description:
‘Space Hero 50’ is a game where you can feel the nostalgia of the color LCD handheld games of the 80s.
In this game, you become a space hero, the guardian of the universe, and face 50 invasions of the Invaders.
Use a powerful laser rifle and a super bomb that compresses the power of a black hole to defeat the invaders that invade one after another.

name: KonMari Spark Joy!
description: Spark Joy! is a storybook puzzle game that takes players through the joyful journey of tidying using the KonMari Method in the form of solving different puzzles. A heartwarming story for everyone. The game features two alternating types of puzzle games, Yin and Yang. “Yin” puzzles help clear the mind through Zen-like garden puzzles. In “Yang” puzzles, players move colorful cubes to a specified shape while clearing away unnecessary blocks. The game’s soundtrack is composed of beautiful tracks with upbeat, uplifting music for “Yang” and soothing notes for “Yin”.

name: Tiger Soldier I: MP038
description: Tiger Soldier is a military-themed run & gun shooter game. Playing as a lone soldier, first by fighting off infantry units and battling tanks then lob a hand grenade into the enemy's fort, destroy the enemy's fort to clear game. The DLC include mission pack 038.

description: The game's system is somewhere between air combat and naval warfare. It's a lot like the old game I played as a kid, and we control fighters to destroy the enemy's fleet. The DLC include mission pack 049.
