name: Tiger Striker: MP071
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC includes map pack 071.

name: Tiger Striker: MP075
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC includes map pack 075.

name: Tiger Striker: MP073
description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC includes map pack 073.

name: WRC 10: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of WRC 10 includes:
- The base game
- The Mitsubishi Lancer Evo V and 1 additional historic event
- The Arena Panzerplatte super special stage (SSS)
- The Career Starter Pack
- Access to WRC+ for 3 months*

name: A Total War Saga: Troy - Mythic Edition
description: The battle for Troy cannot be waged by man alone. Save 30% with the Mythic Edition and experience an unforgettable journey into the myth of the Trojan war.

name: A Total War Saga: Troy - Heroic Edition
description: Jump into the definitive Troy experience with these time-limited offers. Save 40% with the Heroic Edition, packed with content including the Troy base game and three epic DLC packs, bringing the full breadth of the Trojan War to life.

name: Penguin Quest
description: Penguin quest - A bright platformer about a little penguin who went on a journey. Collect apples and coins on a variety of snow-covered levels, avoid deep chasms and sharp thorns, and beware of treacherous snowmen that will prevent you from going to victory!

name: Neighbor Diana
description: Neighbor Diana is a first-person adventure. In this game you spy on your neighbor Diana. At some point, you get the idea to put a webcam in Diana's room to monitor her. You will need to solve puzzles and complete various tasks to set up a webcam.

name: Suddenly Meow
description: Tim is an adventurous cat who loves to explore mysterious places and is always hungry for more. In this Match3 adventure he is lost in a dark forest full of shadows and dangers lurking under the silent trees. Help Tim escape and restore peace to the forest!

name: Sokocat: Dungeon
description: kitten Jones adventure into a mysterious ancient temple on a volcanic island looking for relics, solving puzzles and avoiding dangers along the way. Does this cat have 9 lives?

name: Big Flappy Tower vs. Tiny Square
description: Fling, flip, and flap around a new delightfully difficult Big Tower game! No sprint and no floaty controls! Just quick deaths and generous respawn points. Can you reach the top of the tower and rescue your Pineapple?

name: Skeleton Troubles
description: Skeleton troubles - This platformer will put on your shoulders an unusual task - resurrect your skeleton hero, collecting bones and hearts in the dungeon so that he regains his strength and teach all his enemies a lesson. Jump over the spikes, dodge the cunning slugs that will shoot at you and run to victory!

name: Alien Hunt
description: Alien hunt - Take on the role of an alien who loves to hunt for jewels in this extraordinary platformer! Climb deeper into the caves and collect all the gems, but beware of vampires who will be very unhappy that someone disturbed their peace.

name: Spaceship Trouble
description: Hey, pilot! Our spaceship get in trouble! We are in a dangerous place full of asteroids and pirates! Can you save your spaceship captain?

name: Lullaby Days
description: Fairy fantasy simulation 『Lullaby Days』 is a game where the goal is to grow a duckling girl into a hero. Your duckling girl will grow through education, part-time work, exploration, and more. Create 70 endings in the Kingdom of Oberebach with around 90 sub-characters.

name: Lost Kittens: Maze Garden
description: Find and save the kittens lost in the maze. This is a cute and relaxing game, but it will challenge your memory and hand coordination.

name: Build & Battle
description: Build&Battle is a turn-based tower defense with classic rts base building elements. Build your maze of towers, lay out your plan of attack and execute it with the next turn.

name: Surgeon Simulator 2 Launch Bundle
description: It's time to ‘scrub in' solo or jump into 4 player online games in this physics-based surgery sim with ludicrous coop and competitive play, plus an awesome builder mode. Unearth the mysteries of the Bossa Labs Medical Facility and save Bob's life. Get ready to team up for trauma!

name: Kitaria Fables: Deluxe Edition
description: Kitaria Fables is a delightfully cute action adventure RPG with farming and crafting! Armed with a sword, bow and spellbook, fight back against a rising darkness threatening the world. Discover diverse regions in search of relics and resources, tend to your farm to grow your own provisions, and take on quests solo or with a friend in local co-op mode!

name: Forty Thieves Solitaire Collection
description: Do you love Forty Thieves Solitaire (also known as "Napoleon at St Helena" or "Big Forty"), but want a bigger challenge? Now you can play Forty Thieves Solitaire and other popular variants with different levels of difficulty.

name: Fantasy Sliding Puzzle
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring epic fantasy female characters.

name: Food Delivery Battle
description: Hello, drivers! Have you ever wanted to play a game with your own original character? Well, “Food Delivery Battle” is your answer. “Food Delivery Battle” is a delivery game that is compatible with VRoidHub.

name: Vazial Saga XX
description: Brainwash the fools, exploit taxes, strengthen your armaments, prosper your descendants, and conquer the world!

name: Big Beautiful Cthulhu
description:
An arcade style 2.5D game where the player plays as Cthulhu, eating planets to get larger, whilst avoiding black holes and stars.

This game was made by a two man team for the Epic MegaJam 2021, with the theme 'running out of space'.

name: Ultimate Physical Wrestling
description: A professional wrestling game that can be played with that "ring-shaped controller"! Four wrestlers stand in front of you! Use your own body to make your move!

name: Office Strike War: Multiplayer Battle Royale
description: Office Strike is a multiplayer Battle Royale game where you can play with up to 24 players against each other in a battle for survival!

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Mythic Edition
description: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Mythic Edition includes a base game, an Art Book, Digital OST, Digital Map, 4 in-game items: Magnificent Plume Hat, Ratcatcher's Goggles, Dashing Cavalier's Gloves, Righteous Exorcist's Bracers and a Season Pass.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Commander Edition
description: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - Commander Edition includes a base game, an Art Book, Digital OST, Digital Map, and 4 in-game items: Magnificent Plume Hat, Ratcatcher's Goggles, Dashing Cavalier's Gloves, Righteous Exorcist's Bracers.

name: Tank Golfing
description: Have you ever played golf with a tank? Now you can. Tank golfing is a new twist on this classic sport. You try to shoot golf balls with your tank, sounds simple, but requires skill. Laid back, but not easy.

name: A Total War Saga: Troy - Ajax & Diomedes
description: Forge your legacy on the Aegean battlefields with the new DLC for A Total War Saga: TROY! Jump into the fray as two of the most iconic heroes of the age, Ajax & Diomedes, with their unique armies, mighty Paragon units, and new methods to conquer Troy.

name: A Total War Saga: Troy - Amazons
description: Harness the power of the Amazon warriors in the first DLC for A Total War Saga: TROY. Enjoy two new factions; new epic heroes Hippolyta and Penthesilea; new female-only unit rosters; three new faction mechanics; two new epic mission chains, and more!With a Horde army at your side, roam the world and capture new settlements.

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Early USSR Championships
description: All this current chess hype is producing too many know-it-alls. It's time to teach you kids real chess from my fellow masters. Enroll now and you might learn a thing or two.

name: Space X Collector
description: This platform game may be one of the most challenging games you've ever seen in your life.

name: Battle Brigade
description: Experience the intensity of head-to-head battle with Battle Brigade! Choose from 8 iconic characters, then battle against them with a robust variety of match options.

name: Castle: Daybreak
description: Embark on an adventure as you unlock new abilities and take on challenging enemies! Explore the open world and survive the night!

name: Loot Train
description: Loot Train is a procedurally generated game where you take control of a hooded thief, that has a will bent on robbery, in a train full of valuables. Progress through train cars to defeat colorful enemies, and weird bosses summoned by the Guild of Righteous Protectors, to stop your genocide!

name: Idle Trader Simulator
description: Idle Trader Simulator - is a simulator of buying / selling currency in the stock market. The game will help you get a first idea of the financial market, without losing your real money.

name: Carrot Girl Adventures
description: Carrot girl adventures is a game for platformer fans. Help the carrot girl get through dangerous labyrinths and collect as many coins as possible. The secret of successful passage is simple - collect coins and deftly jump over the abyss and spikes on the way to the green flags that will help you to pass to the next level.

name: Funny Farm Animal Jigsaw Puzzle Game for Kids and Toddlers
description: This animal puzzle game has been specially developed for children and includes different levels of difficulty that are freely adjustable. Furthermore, help functions can optionally be switched on, or the rotation for the puzzle pieces can be switched on. As soon as the rotation for the parts has been switched on, the parts can be rotated 90 degrees at a time. The puzzle game contains many great, funny and unique animal motifs suitable for children. Please note that this jigsaw puzzle game only supports touchscreen functionality. The menu and the scenes can only be played with the touch controls!

name: Farmers Co-op: Out of This World
description: Farmers Co-op: Out of This World is a couch co-op for up to 4 players. Your people are starving back home, its up to you and three other farmers to grow as much produce as possible and send them back to your home planet.

name: Extreme Car Driver
description:
Drive 15 Awesome Cars & Trucks through tricky raised road courses, packed full of narrow ramps, bridges, slaloms, see-saws, tunnels and jumps! This is no ordinary “driving game”. It’s the ULTIMATE Precision Driving Simulator Experience!

Each vehicle will test your precision driving skills to the limit on these challenging courses. Can you find YOUR limit without falling off the track? Stunning effects in beautiful locations including night driving with real headlights, depth-of-field, real-time shadows and beautifully detailed cars to collect. Have you got what it takes to pass the ultimate test?!

name: Angel's Punishment
description: Nintendo Switch exclusive game. In this game you play as an Angel who got his wings taken away from him by archangels when he refused to follow his superiors' orders of not interfering in the cruelties of the evil beings on Earth.

name: A Total War Saga: Troy - Mythos
description: The battle for Troy cannot be waged by man alone. In this big, bold Expansion Pack, recruit monsters and creatures of myth to fight at your side, turning the tide of war on new fantastical battlefields and a refreshed campaign map. Find the Cerberus – a vicious beast guarding the abyss – the Griffin – a winged master of the skies – and the Hydra – a nine-headed serpent spreading poison and madness. Harness their power and experience true myth to decide the fate of Troy once and for all.

name: BOT.vinnik Chess
description: Improve your chess knowledge with the help of BOT.vinnik, a soviet digital teacher.

name: Hinata in Hot Maze
description: while traveling, Hinata found a maze and decided to enter it filming everything with her camera, the further she went through it, the hotter it became in it and she had to undress because of the heat, the maze is drawn during its passage

name: You Can Pet the Dog VR
description: Fulfill the ultimate fantasy: going outside and petting a dog. In You Can Pet The Dog VR, players can pet and play with an adorable dog in a beautiful environment.

name: Malum
description: Malum is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Hell has come to Earth and only our most fearless warriors can hold back the tide. Unfortunately for us, that means you guys.

name: Weapon of Choice DX
description: Weapon of Choice DX is a high-energy, run 'n' gun where each playable character is unique with their own special weapon and abilities! Blast insane aliens, find new player characters, and choose between branching paths! The world is being taken over by gene-combining beings from beyond the stars! Hideous new creatures are popping up everywhere, and it's up to the Solus Operatives to grab their unique weapons and split some disgusting alien skulls!

name: Shindig
description: Shindig is a short point-and-click adventure that celebrates the low-key heroism of helping. Explore a cosy hand-drawn world, solve the boggles of your animal friends, and bring the whole community together for a joyous party!

name: Demon Gaze Extra
description: An enhanced version of dungeon-crawler Demon Gaze. Among the new features are improved graphics and production, as well as updated controls and the possibility of new content that takes place after the conclusion of the main story.

name: Demon Gaze Extra: Memorial Edition
description:
An enhanced version of dungeon-crawler Demon Gaze. Among the new features are improved graphics and production, as well as updated controls and the possibility of new content that takes place after the conclusion of the main story.

The Memorial Edition includes:
- Demon Gaze EXTRA
- Memorial soundtrack
- Original notebook
- DLC (*while supplies last)

name: Cargo Company
description: Cargo Company is a transport simulation tycoon game where you make money by transporting passengers, wood, steel, goods, cars, tanks and more - using trains, trucks, busses, and even rockets between planets.

name: WRC 10
description: Hailed by reviewers and professional drivers, the standard-setting off-road racing simulation has been reinvented! Reach the 2021 season podium, and to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the competition, relive the highlights at the wheel of legendary cars. Never has the WRC experience been this intense! Rise to the challenge!

name: Puzzling Places
description:
Puzzling Places brings relaxing and wholesome 3D jigsaw puzzling to VR. Put together hyper-realistic miniatures of beautiful places from around the globe. Enter the meditative flow of puzzling and enjoy each place coming alive with their unique & immersive soundscapes as you complete them.

Puzzling Places is a modern take on an age-old pastime that’s fun for the whole family thanks to its simple gameplay and easy controls. Play seated, standing, or at full roomscale!

name: Crazy Chicken: Shooter Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Magister
description: The Magister is a murder-mystery card-battler RPG. Build and customise your deck to fight in battles, or use 'Tactical Diplomacy' to pacify those who stand in your way. Gather clues and discover motives as you investigate the death of your predecessor and unmask the guilty culprit.

name: Big Rumble Boxing: Creed Champions
description: Are you ready to become a boxing champion? Step into the ring and show off your boxing skills in a knockout arcade experience. Fight as 20 iconic characters from the Creed and Rocky universe. Take on world-class opponents across a variety of thrilling locations, or challenge your friends and family in intense, head-to-head matches.

name: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous
description: Embark on a journey to a realm overrun by demons in Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous, a new epic RPG from the creators of the critically acclaimed Pathfinder: Kingmaker. Explore the nature of good and evil, learn the true cost of power, and rise as a Mythic Hero capable of deeds beyond mortal expectations.

name: Legend Bowl
description: Legend Bowl brings you back to the glory days of pixel-style football games of the past! Enjoy a hybrid of arcade-style football and simulation aspects on and off the field. Fully customize players and teams to create an endless amount of variety in your league. Sim-based controls with challenging gameplay mechanics bring the fight to your doorstep! Legend Bowl includes Exhibition Mode, Tournament Mode, Franchise Mode, Training Camp Mode, and a boatload of customization options.

name: Block Puzzle
description: Block Puzzle is a strategy / puzzle game with innovative mechanics that will surprise anyone who plays it. With 5 different game modes you will not get tired of it in a long time.

name: Earl the Tomb Robber
description: Take Earl the Tomb Robber on an adventure in search of treasure!

name: Archer 2
description: Heavily inspired by Die Hard, Archer 2 takes place in a multi story office building overrun with terrorists! This time there are no bombs to diffuse, but there are a few to set off, and lots of hidden hamburgers to find to restore your health!

name: Archer
description: You play as a guy with a bow and arrow - an archer, if you will - who must search the ... mines maybe... in search of bombs to diffuse.

name: Captain Blind
description: This one stars'Captain Blind' as he beat up plant things and other random enemies.

name: Cosmic Ark
description: An unofficial remake the Atari 2600 game. Survive the bombardment of asteroids and rescue alien critters from the planet's surface.

name: Maniac Outhouse
description:
The Challenge... set an adventure in a house that's the exact opposite of a multi-room mansion.

In this (barely) Point & Click adventure you have one goal ...It is a very short "game"!

name: Orb of Millean
description: Straight up fantasy side scroller slash-em-up! Save the world of Millean by defeating the invading monsters and restoring the Orb!

name: Sir Erik
description: Guide the Knight with the Nose through a series of dungeons filled with monsters and robots alike! Destroy everything that moves!

name: Stop Thief
description: This game was inspired by the arcade game Narc, just shooting a bunch of bad guys on the street and occasionally using a rocket launcher to clear out enemies. But then there's the hang glider stage!

name: After a While
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Tea Tycoon
description: Help the kitties build a bubble tea business.

name: Cocomelon: Laptop Infantil
description: Sin descripción

name: Dirt 5: Wild Spirits Content Pack
description: Continue your journey in the DIRT Off-Road Series with the Wild Spirits Content Pack - with new cars, Career events, sponsors and customisation items!

name: Cimmerian Night
description: Three-map mini-episode with a small base level, a medium-sized nonlinear wizard-style map, and a large homage to E4M4- The Palace of Hate. It comes with custom music tracks. The map sources are incuded.

name: Essence//Structure
description: Here you'll be thrown into a place named the Structure as an unknown Entity. You are free to roam around and collect Essence, a ressource that you'll need to fly around and move with great agility and speed. Learn more about the Structure by searching memories of the place, and get one of the two endings possibles.

name: Samedi Manor
description: Samedi Manor is an idle game about generating money and resources by building various different types of undead in order to restore Baron Samedi to the Pantheon of Death.

name: Genshin Impact: Floating World Under the Moonlight
description:
Version 2.1 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Raiden Shogun, Sangonomiya Kokomi, Kujou Sara and Aloy
• New areas: Watatsumi Island and Seirai Island
• New main story quests: Chapter II, Act III - Omnipresence Over Mortals
• New story quests for Raiden Shogun and Sangonomiya Kokomi
• New main event: Moonlight Merriment
• …and more!

name: Brulo's Ballble Teafense!
description:
You work the 24/7 at your own bar. Between dealing with rabid rodents and wild customers, you have your hands full. Today seems to be your unlucky day.

The Ballbusters have planned their biggest raid yet, and every hour seems to be rush hour! It's up to you to take care of these pests... well, and the moles too.

name: Parasite Black
description: Parasite Black is a mature, dark fantasy adult RPG sandbox game, with turn-based combat and VN style sandbox exploration, set in the world of Mirnos, a world under the fierce onslaught of a dangerous, bizarre race known as the Demorai.

name: Do What They Say
description:
This is a Public Service Announcement, the world is experiencing a Class G Global Event.

All agents are required by Global Catastrophe Protocol 56-EE to complete their alloted redaction paperwork before extermination can be allowed to take place.

Management would like to remind you that any extermination that takes place before Global Catastrophe Protocol 56-EE may incur penalties, such as but not limited to, loss of fleet vehicle access, reduction of holiday hours, sudden psychic expungement and eviction from allocated staff accomodation.

DO WHAT WE SAY

name: My GF Doesn't Know What I'm Into
description: A visual novel about my cute new girlfriend, who doesn't know what i'm into!

name: OneShot: The Tarion Machine
description:
Welcome to the Tarion Machine.

After the events of Solstice, The World Machine discovers a remote disruption targeting itself at them. Investigating the cause, they come across a new world led by an oddly upbeat World Machine...

name: No Man's Sky: Frontiers
description: Become Overseer of your very own procedurally generated alien settlement in update 3.6, FRONTIERS. Make choices, guide your citizens, develop new structures and defend your people from the Sentinels. Or, take advantage of a massive overhaul of base building to construct your own dream base.

name: Pokémon Go: Season of Mischief
description: The fourth implementation of seasons intersected with the Autumn season in Northern Hemisphere and Spring season in the Southern Hemisphere. A theme of this season is the Mythical Pokémon, Hoopa, which gets introduced through a special Season long Special Research, with new tasks opening up as the season progresses.

name: Deep City
description:
A small game for the PS1 Horror Jam 2021 made by Felix Kraus with audio by Viktor Kraus.
You started your journey on this rusty boat a long time ago. One night you are woken by an unusual noise and you get dragged down below.

name: Apartment No. 9: BxG Version
description: Help Rue find happiness or lead him to ruin in this dark slice-of-life story about a teacher whose life is turned upside down when the homeless girl he often stares at out of his window shows up at his door, claiming to have found his wallet.

name: La Madriguera
description: The game takes place in a simple scene in which our character will try by all means to get a piece of cake. Sure, as long as that doesn't mean having to get out of his chair.

name: Stabfish 2
description: Welcome to the wet and wild world of Stabfish 2. If you loved the original Stabfish then you are going to love its sequel. Stabfish 2 elevates the already unique gameplay of the original game and adds a bunch of cool new mechanics which allow you to flex your strategy. Play multiplayer in Unicorn Sharks Arena! Go treasure Hunting or hit up armageddon Mode: Every hour, Armageddon Event will occur, no new players are allowed to join. Test your skill to be the last survivors!

name: American Truck Simulator: International LT
description: Designed and engineered to keep drivers more comfortable and productive for the long haul, the International LT is the most driver-centric, uptime-focused truck that International Trucks has ever delivered.

name: Tap Ninja
description: Destroy enemies, earn gold, upgrade your village, become a Ninja Master!

name: Tsuki's Odyssey
description: Tsuki’s Odyssey is a passive adventure game that immerses you into the world of Tsuki and the oddball characters of Mushroom Village. Decorate your home, make friends, catch all kinds of fish and so much more! It is important to note that Tsuki is not your pet, but a free spirit who will move and interact with the world as they please. But if you check in often, you just might catch something new and exciting happening in the town!

name: Fallen London: Damp Martyrs
description: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for September, 2021.

name: Double-Entry Bookkeeping Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Summer Gems
description:
Summer.

A special time when anything can happen.

The possibilities are infinite: even a shard of glass worn by the sea

can become the most precious treasure.

Friendships are like that.

In a seaside summer, friendships can last no longer

than a splashing wave.

But like those pieces of glass,

they're turned into treasures by the sea.

That is what happens to Leo and Mara.

Join them in this little summer break through the salty breeze

of the Mediterranean Sea.

Explore. Live. Love.

name: Shadow over Normoth
description:
Taking inspiration from PS1 classics like Resident Evil and Silent Hill, Shadow over Normoth sets out to bring you back to the original survival horror experience. With fixed cameras, tank controls and visuals that are reminiscent of the good old days, you will truly feel like it's 1996 again.

Unravel the mystery behind the town of Normoth, gather resources and survive the horrors of this forsaken place. You will once again enter the world of survival horror ... good luck!

name: The Adventures of Panzer
description: Adventures of Panzer for the NES.

name: 10 Hours Below
description:
10 Hours Below is a game about exploring a scene using a Timeline to find monsters in a 10 hours long animation!

You can try to search actively, or just let the game run in background for 10 hours and see the environment evolve. I think finding the 3 monsters require a lot of patience.

name: Last Colony
description:
Run your colony after the collapse of society

Recruit colonists, craft weapons and supplies and venture out from your colony base to gather resources
Life is rough in the new world with hardcore shooter gameplay to match

Craft guns, bombs, meds and armor
Upgrade your guns with 50+ possible combinations
Chose an ability that matches your play style
Level up to unlock more crafting recipes

name: Blitzkrieg Fire
description:
Blitzkrieg Fire is a turn-based strategic wargame set in the European and North African theaters of World War II. Take command of the land, air, and naval forces of Britain, Germany, the USSR, the United States, Italy, France, Poland, Finland, Romania, and many other nations in the largest conflict in history.
Experience the entire war through 19 historically accurate campaigns, from the Spanish Civil War to the downfall of Germany. Command squadrons of more than 230 types of aircraft, from iconic warbirds like the Spitfire and Bf-109 to less well-known types like the Soviet I-16 and Polish P.24. Control the seas with more than 80 types of warships including submarines, battleships and aircraft carriers.

name: Underground Warriors
description: Underground Warriors is a play-to-earn fighting game developed on Lamden’s blockchain where your character fights in underground fights for money and fame. You get rewarded with tokens (Warrior Points) for each victory obtained.

name: Chicken with Dynamites
description:
It seems easy to do all 3 at first try but you will find otherwise as the level progresses.
Free the imprisoned chicks by blowing up their cages to complete a level. Don't forget to eat all the corns too before rescuing the last chick and keep your health at 100% for a perfect game score. Avoid all the snipers and entities that can send you to chicken heaven (or someone's dinner plate).
The game looks easy to play but your strategy skills will be challenged on higher levels.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: PREG B16mnopux 106
description: Used for regional passenger trains in Poland, Romania, Czech Republic, and Germany this passenger coach features photorealistic textures, fully PBR textures, and many different options.

name: Winterlore II
description: There's a new obstacle in Moroi Springs. What is it this time around? Follow the story of Ozana and her new found powers. The traditions she knew inside out bring a new meaning to her way of life and to Mamaie's customs. She'll mend herbs, brew concoctions and cook sweets for the solstice feast. Along the way she'll encounter guests bringing in new beginnings, while others appear uninvited into the home. Winterlore II is the second game set in the universe of Moroi Springs. Uncover the region of Moroi Springs and its mysteries. Discover lost traditions and folklore by solving puzzles. Immerse yourself in the narrative through hand-crafted graphics and an atmospheric soundtrack. Unveil the hidden story by examining old objects and connect the dots.

name: Dungeons & Miners
description: Something is rotten in the state of Gravulgar. You are an outsider in search of adventure; equipped with sword, shield and your trusty pickaxe, you must pave your way through dangerous dungeons and haunted mines to help the king restore the kingdgom to its former glory.

name: The Sol Device 2
description: After escaping the research ship, Samuel finds himself crash landed on a foreign planet overrun by a hostile organization. Now it's up to Samuel and his trusty SOL equipment to rescue the scientists who also escaped the ship, and find a way off of the planet.

name: Misty Girls
description: After several failures, unfortunately you were put into the trial by the Boss as a new trial product. You have no choice but to go forward. What will be the result. . .

name: Endless Blue
description: Endless Blue is a classic survival horror adventure set in a mysterious underwater research facility.

name: Luxoral Prime
description: An alien themed webgame!

name: Brandon, You're Going to Hell!
description: A side scrolling journey through the head of Brandon. A young man that grew up believing anything that he thought was cool would end up sending him to Hell! Face your demons, the fires of Hell, religious grandmas, and more. Find out about yourself and try to avoid being taken to Hell in the process.

name: A Day in the Park
description: A Day in the Park is a gay dating sim visual novel with three endings per date and one overall ending for the game (once you've completed dates with all four guys).

name: A Princess of Fallen Kingdom
description: 王国遭偷袭而隕落，勇士與青梅竹馬的公主被迫賣身淪落為奴隸，一夜之間一無所有。二人為了贖回自由身而在流放地努力工作，在冒险中互相救贖，同時也漸漸地揭開了事件真相的面紗……

name: Secret Trouble
description: A totally ordinary, average wizard is having problems with some troublesome magical artifacts. One of those troublesome magical beings is you. Try and juggle as much as you can and earn as much points as you can.

name: Zombeez: A Killer Queen Remix
description:
The first single-player Killer Queen experience comes home! ZOMBEEZ: A Killer Queen Remix is a frantic 2D platformer built directly on top of the Killer Queen Arcade engine. Run, fly, and slay your way through the undead horde as you head towards a fated showdown with the terrifying Blood Queen!

Built directly on top of the Killer Queen engine, ZOMBEEZ: A Killer Queen Remix takes the skills and techniques found in Killer Queen and applies them to an entirely new experience, full of never-before-seen enemies and challenges. As the titular hero, Abs, you'll run, fly, and slay your way through the undead horde as you head towards a fated showdown with the terrifying, all-powerful Blood Queen!

name: 2033: Das Erschwachen der Macht
description: Sin descripción

name: Zen: A Gay Sequel
description: Zen: A Gay Sequel (ZAGS) is a gay, planner-focused, stat-based, dating sim set in college. It is a full sequel to YAGS.

name: MannaWars
description: MannaWars is a fast top-down arcade space shooter. Fight PVP battles with up to 32 players, or try your luck in CO-OP mode against waves of enemies! As long as one of your team survives, the whole team survives! All modes are available in single-player as well!

name: Hermes: Tricks of Thanatos
description: Someone has thrown open the Gates of Hell and is letting the damned escape into the realm of the living! Battle malevolent spirits, call on demigods to provide aid and restore life to a besieged world!

name: Kyou no Sekai: Crazy World
description: This work is a Japanese-style survival horror game. Operate the hero who got lost in another world and return to the heroine and her original world who also got lost in another world.

name: The Babysitter
description: The incredible story of Alice searching for a kid who got lost in a fantasy world.

name: Tian Hong Bookstore
description: The game art style uses 2d pixels. In the game, the player plays a high school student who has undergone a transfer. There are multiple endings based on factors such as task completion.

name: Cannon
description: Activate the cannons in the right order to destroy all cubes

name: Space Adventures
description: An endless adventure in the middle of empty space. You will have to fight off endless waves of enemy ships, pumping your own and moving forward through space. Be careful, your opponents are getting stronger and stronger every time!

name: Burn Me Alive
description: Explore a surreal world, solve puzzles, fight monsters and get to the bottom of the mystery of this compelling horror thriller.

name: Danger Ahead
description: You are a lone alien robot lost in some kind of space void where there is only strange signs and nothing but death in front of you.

name: Tetrix 3D
description: 3D remake of the ageless classic puzzle game. Familiar Tetris gameplay with new features. Move, rotate blocks, clear lines!

name: Shawarma or Shaverma
description: Shawarma or Shaverma - a rogue-like game made in 2D hand-drawn graphics in which you need to help Shawarmyonok Gennady .

name: Multia Space Program
description: Ever wanted to build a rocket out of junk? Well, now you can! This game exists in the same multiverse as Project Ultra and is in fact a prequel! A short adventure but hopefully a lot of fun!

name: Debie Zone
description: DEBIE ZONE BAD DUDES HAVE TAKEN OVER YOUR TOWN. THE DoD SENDS IN SPECIAL AGENT DEBIE ZONE TO STOP THEM.

name: Light the World
description: Light the World is a simulation puzzle game. The year is 2125 and the world is on the brink of destruction as a result of rampant unchecked pollution. Clouds of pollution blanket the sky and prevent most sunlight from reaching the earth's surface.

name: Uncrashed: FPV Drone Simulator
description: Amateur or experienced FPV pilot, learn or improve your skills on Uncrashed,the new ultra realistic FPV simulator. Simulate your own FPV drone with settings based on real values and you will have the same feeling as a real flight without the risk of breaking your drone !

name: Animal Puzzle: Preschool Learning Game for Kids and Toddlers
description: This animal plug-in peg puzzle educational game has been specially developed for young children of kindergarten age and for preschoolers. Dear parents: Please note that this game does not require your child to speak any language. The game does not contain any text or speech output and works intuitively using easily understandable symbols and graphics. It is therefore perfectly suitable for all countries and languages! The puzzle game contains many great, funny and unique animal motifs suitable for children. Please note that this puzzle only supports touchscreen functionality. The menu and the scenes can only be played with the touch controls!

name: Big Cat from Hell
description: Big Cat from Hell is a kinetic novel about a boy and a demon.

name: Jumanji: The Curse Returns
description: A game for those who seek to find a way to leave their world behind… roll the dice, read the riddles and experience the board game from the original 1995 film in a contemporary digital style. The Jumanji game will summon a magical jungle and take over the town — unless you stop it!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Switzerland
description: Sin descripción

name: HangTogether
description: Its Hangman, but with your Friends... Hopefully.

name: Bird Pro Skater
description: Bird Pro Skater is an addictive runner game to help people relax. Skate across different countries and perform dangerous stunts on trampolines.

name: Custodian: Beginning of the End
description: Custodian: Beginning of the End is a brutal and difficult platformer designed for caution and reaction. Explore, seek secrets and collect mechanisms to become even stronger and meet the impending End!

name: Cute Bite
description: A vampire raising sim! Teach your Little Mistress skills and train her to hunt for blood so that she can regain her powers, save your life, and possibly take over the world...

name: Super Woden GP
description: Feel the excitement of the 90s with the isometric perspective, its huge number of vehicles and its brilliant soundtrack. More than 60 cars from six manufacturers from different countries to buy, an extensive campaign mode, dozens of circuits, rally stages, championships, and much more awaits you!

name: At Your Feet
description: In this yuri dating sim, take on the role of Emma, a twenty year old college student of Mexican origin who has a secret: she has a foot fetish.

name: Stellar Raid
description: Stellar Raid is a side-scrolling run and gun game inspired by the greatest classic games of the genre! With a variety of weapon upgrades at your disposal (including a support drone) you’ll charge through hordes of enemy mercenaries to take down one of the Universe’s most notorious space terrorists!

name: Voronica Cleans House: a Vore Adventure
description: A visual novel with high interactivity, 'Voronica Cleans House' currently includes an hour of voracious gameplay, five potential transformations, nine victims, five main characters, a hundred and twenty five Full HD CG renders, over 10,000 words and way too many sprites!

name: Kitaria Fables
description: Action Adventure fused with RPG and Farming elements. Armed with sword, bow and spellbook, fight against a rising darkness threatening the world. Plunder dungeons in search of relics and resources, tend to your farm to make provisions and potions, and take on quests solo, or with a friend!

name: Abs vs. The Blood Queen
description: The first single-player Killer Queen experience comes home! Abs vs. The Blood Queen is a frantic 2D platformer built directly on top of the Killer Queen Arcade engine. Run, fly, and slay your way through the undead horde as you head towards a fated showdown with the terrifying Blood Queen!

name: Cloud Gardens
description:
A chill game about using plants to overgrow abandoned wasteland dioramas.

In Cloud Gardens players must harness the power of nature to overgrow lo-fi scenes of urban decay and manufactured landscapes. By planting seeds in the right places, they’re able to create small overgrown dioramas of brutalism and beauty, salvaging and repurposing hundreds of discarded objects to create unique structures for nature to reclaim.

Players can dive into a relaxing sandbox mode with no goals, where they are simply left to delight in their own creativity and create beautiful scenes, or take on a “campaign” of six chapters, where the task is to strike a balance between nature and the manufactured by covering each scene with salvaged objects and lush vegetation.

This is a chill game where the player is allowed to delight in their own creativity. The player's task is to completely cover the scene in plants. As you overgrow the objects, a meter fills to show your progress. You are given objects to expand the scene. These objects contribute energy to the growing of plants, but you will also have to cover them in foliage to complete the stage, striking a balance between nature and the manufactured.

With generative soundscapes by Amos Roddy, composer of the Kingdom Series.

name: Rift Wizard
description: Rift Wizard is a tough as nails fantasy roguelike featuring challenging turn based combat and deep open ended character building. Craft your spellbook from over 100 unique spells and abilities and fight your way through a series of procedurally generated challenges to defeat your nemesis.

name: WizardPunk
description: WizardPunk is a precise 3D-Fighter with random fighter generation and permadeath, focused on customization. Adventure mode provides an RPG-like experience, with stat growth and guild specialization. Versus mode provides a more classic fighting experience.

name: Lake
description: It's 1986 - Meredith Weiss takes a break from her career in the big city to deliver mail in her hometown. How will she experience two weeks in beautiful Providence Oaks, with its iconic lake and quirky community? And what will she do next? It's up to you.

name: Iron Guard VR
description: Iron Guard VR is a sci-fi tower defense game made in the spirit of classic RTS games. Find out why the terraformer robots have rebelled and help evacuate your crew from an unknown planet, where survival is the new frontier.

name: WW2: Bunker Simulator
description: World War 2 - Bunker Simulator is a bunker life simulator with shooter elements. Player has to perform subsequent missions, takes care of his needs and with all his arms defends the bunker - even when he has no energy and runs out of ammunition.

name: Hitman 3: Seven Deadly Sins Act 5 - Gluttony
description:
HITMAN 3: Seven Deadly Sins takes you deep into the mind of Agent 47. Get exclusive sin-themed suits and take on brand new challenges to unlock unique rewards. Can you resist all seven sins?

This content pack includes Act 5: Gluttony. All seven Acts can be purchased together in the Seven Deadly Sins Collection.

name: Intershellar
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac-01
description:
A certain round yellow guy, who’s probably the most iconic video game character ever, makes his entrance in ARC8’s recent MSX game called “PAC-01”. That’s right, it is Pac-Man himself that makes waves in the world’s fastest dot eating game.

Combine Pac-Man with relentless vertical scrolling, and you get an interesting game concept. In PAC-01, your playfield scrolls from bottom to top, as pills are scattered around to be eaten. However, pills aren’t the sole item on the menu. The point of PAC-01 is that you advance a level when you had all six of the the spooky baddies for lunch – or dinner, whatever you prefer. Also, as is only befitting in a Pac-Man themed game, pieces of fruit will appear occasionally to serve as a refreshing snack which will increase your score.

In this fine piece of Z80 entertainment, you hunt down the ghosts that escaped from the glitch; the deadly green computer bits at the bottom of the screen. This pool of game glitches also means instant death to our yellow little protagonist. So, don’t let those bits byte you!

PAC-01 features a one and two player mode, as well as a “Fast Game” mode. Whereas the objective in the 1P mode is to munch up all of the ghosts, in 2P mode the player with the most points wins when the game is over (which happens when the maze ends).

As for the Fast Mode it means… well, just survive!

name: Waluigi's Road to Glory: Horlogic Will Go On
description: The plot of this SMW Hack happens during the events of Luigi's Misadventures 3: Recipe for a disaster. This hack contains 112 exits.

name: Him & Her: Her Challenges
description: Sin descripción

name: Spiritfarer: Beverly Update
description: The Beverly Update contains new features, quality of life changes and narrative tweaks. From new food items, to brand new buildings, there are lots of new content to explore!

name: The Big Con: Grift of the Year Edition
description: Grift through the totally rad '90s in all its plaid and payphone glory!

name: Peyton's Post-Op Visits
description: Join Peyton as he visits his old roommate Marcus after his top surgery, and learns the ways their lives have converged and diverged in the years since they last met.

name: The Salvation Project
description: Because if you don't care, they will.

name: Frontier Diver Progenexis
description: Dive into the depths of END CITY and discover the horrors NT-Field crisis has left in its wake.

name: Headlines from the Deep
description: A short, PS1-style adventure game about fish-based media production.

name: Deep Madness
description: Deep Madness is a casual game where your task is to jump as deep as possible. Will you become the best player in the leaderboard?

name: I Spoke to God
description: A short atmospheric horror game for the 2021 Haunted PS1 Summer of Shivers Game Jam. Reach an abandoned facility at the depths of the ocean to figure out what happened. Just some reconnaissance mission, what could go wrong?

name: Assetto Corsa Mobile
description: Assetto Corsa Mobile is the perfect match for all motor-racing fans, offering a challenging experience for sports car enthusiasts. Featuring 59 officially licensed sports cars – including, among others, iconic models from Abarth, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Maserati, Porsche and Toyota – Assetto Corsa Mobile brings you on track, offering multiple game modes, from the regular Free Practice to Classic Race and Time Attack, to new game mode exclusives, such as Overtake and Speed Camera modes. Pick your preferred driving option (tilt steering, touch-steering or via an external controller) and master real tracks such as Brands Hatch, Laguna Seca or Imola, from a selection of 9 meticulously recreated official circuits, and share your best results on the public leaderboards. Be ready for the most exciting driving simulation on mobile!

name: Explorers: The Game
description: At last you have found it! A new world, untouched and not yet explored. And there are good reasons for that: The landscape is made up of floating rocks that kept this world hidden for years by their movement. But unfortunately, you are not alone. Other explorers are also trying to travel through this strange world and get rich off its resources. It's up to you to make the best use of the exploration maps and cleverly plan your route to become the greatest explorer of all time! Experience the fascination of this tactical flip & write game. Dive in easily with the tutorial and discover more and more diverse tactical possibilities with each game!

name: Law Empire Tycoon
description: Lawyers, Judges, Criminals and Verdicts. Lead an elite law firm and win cases.

name: Rose Knight and Thorn Witch
description:
Rose Knight and Thorn Witch is a fairy tale yuri visual novel series.

In Chapter One, The Girl who Wanted to Become a Knight, Derin Larkspur longs to leave the Thistle Village behind and journey to the Academy where she will train as a knight. When she hears rumors about a witch living in the woods nearby, she vows to drive the witch away to prove herself as a candidate for the Academy.

But is it a witch in the woods or something else entirely?

name: Poker Chase
description: Texas hold 'em poker, with common gacha game thematics.

name: Amazing Cultivation Simulator: Immortal Tales of WuDang
description: The first collaboration content of Amazing Cultivation Simulator is now available! This time, we're releasing a new DLC — Immortal tales of Wudang, in collaboration with the Wudang Museum and the home to many Taoist temples: the Wudang Mountains.

name: Unity of Command II: Moscow 41
description: In Moscow 41 you take control of Soviet forces as they deliver blow after blow to an overextended Wehrmacht during their winter counteroffensives of 1941/42.

name: Anchor Up
description: A calming turn based puzzle game about out-manoeuvring your opponents ships by careful navigation and weapon placement. The weapons you choose, and where you place them on your boat are all part of the puzzle.

name: Wanderlust: The Bermuda Secret - Collector's Edition
description:
After your flight takes you into an ominous cloud bank, you soon find yourself hidden within the eye of a permanent storm at the center of the Bermuda Triangle, with no connection to the rest of the world, no supplies, and no hope of escape from a strange island! This point and click, puzzle adventure tasks players with finding a list of objects hidden, to uncover the truth of the island.

The Collector's Edition Includes;
- Play as Collins to save your beloved in the Bonus Game!
- Navigate the dangerous sky villages with an official strategy guide!
- Go on an exciting treasure hunt and take on the ultimate hidden object puzzle!
- Enjoy exclusive concept art, soundtracks, wallpapers, and more!
- Replay your favorite mini-games to unlock challenging achievements

name: Devil May Cry 5 + Vergil
description:
The ultimate Devil Hunter is back in style, in the game action fans have been waiting for. Includes Playable Character: Vergil content (also available separately).

Please check your previous purchases to avoid duplication.

name: Devil May Cry 5: Deluxe Edition + Vergil
description:
The ultimate Devil Hunter is back in style, in the game action fans have been waiting for. Includes Playable Character: Vergil content (also available separately).

The Deluxe Edition includes the full game plus additional content.

Please check your previous purchases to avoid duplication.

name: Maneater: Apex Edition
description: Experience true ShaRkPG mayhem with the Maneater Apex Edition, which includes both the Maneater base game and the Maneater: Truth Quest DLC.

name: H Office
description: A workplace love game, players need to become a master of time management, in all ambiguous female friends inside the spin

name: Mainly at Rest
description: Show what you can do!!!

name: Idle Monkeylogy
description: IDLE GAME based on the Infinite Monkey Theorem

name: The Lost Dog
description: An emotional, 3rd-person adventure game played as a dog after her owners abandoned her in the wilderness. Help her survive and find a new family; as they realize how loving a dog can help them recover from the pain of grief.

name: Deep Madness
description: Deep Madness is a casual game where your task is to jump as deep as possible. Will you become the best player in the leaderboard?

name: Make a Path for the Chicken
description: After falling into a hole, this Chicken finds herself on a journey to find her chicks. Solve puzzles and make a safer path for the chicken to complete this journey.

name: Pro Strategy Football 2022
description: Manage, Coach, or enjoy watching live sims! Create custom schedules! Configure playoffs formats, create manual brackets, or standalone tournaments! Enjoy revamped animation, custom sounds and music, and more! Season play with up to 130 teams! Career play with many custom league configurations!

name: Jack Axe: The Trial
description: Be Jack! Throw your axe! Test yourself against The Trial to prove yourself worthy in this speedrunning competition!

name: Ooops! 2
description: Stay busy juggling increasingly exciting and complex recipes in this fast & furious cooking game based on the colourful and successful feature film Ooops! 2 ! Slip into the role of Dave or Kate and provide the hungry mob on the ark with ever-changing tasty treats. The wonderful animals on the ark are hungry. As cook for the whole horde of beasts on the ark you’ve got your hands full stuffing all those jaws. Prepare fascinating dishes out of fabulous ingredients and unlock popular characters from the movie. Play as Dave, Finny, Hazel, Leah, or even as Chief Clyde and Patch. Stay busy juggling increasingly exciting and complex recipes and master the widely varied levels. There are many variations of backdrop settings from the movie and numerous original film sequences straight out of the cinema! Ooops! 2 is fabulous game fun for the whole family!

name: Anno 1800: The High Life
description:
The 3rd DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 3 Pass.

Take your city to grand new heights with modular skyscrapers, shopping arcades, and the epic Skyline Tower monument.

name: Ealu
description:
EALU (pronounced ee-lou) (Escape in Galic)

Ealu is a classic side-scrolling adventure, created for and by you.

Jump into story mode to learn the origin of Ealu or head online to test your skills on worlds created by players from around the globe.

The in-game level builder allows you to unleash your creative potential and share it with the world.

If creation isn't your thing you can jump into online mode and experience other creations through 100 lives mode or the level browser.

name: Old Salt
description:
A Naval Strategy Experience With No Reinforcements On The Way

2-4 player online Strategy game with multiple factions.

name: Afterlife Beans
description: You are a bean that is about to go to the after life but someone won't let you to do that! find out who it is in this game! collect coins, shoot enemies and terrible puns are awaiting you, so what are you waiting for? join the bean in afterlife beans.

name: Reactor Tech 2
description: Become the main power engineer of the world - the builder of the most powerful power plant that feeds the whole world! You have to build your own power plant, research new technologies and make the most successful power company in 100 gaming years.

name: Spoils of Plunder
description: Spoils of Plunder is a hardcore action RPG with PvP, co-op and single player modes. It features novel combat and spell mechanics that set it aside from the rest of the genre. Spoils of Plunder is a game where skill matters.

name: Blake: The Visual Novel
description: Graphic Novel meets Visual Novel in this sci-fi/thriller interactive story. As incriminating events start to revolve around him, experience the dark, mind-bending journey of Blake and his pivotal transformation into a vigilante.

name: Unholy Alliance: Tower Defense
description:
Enemies from this world and the dark world fight together in an “Unholy Alliance” to destroy your Extractors. Get ready to stand your ground and defeat enemy hordes using a vast arsenal of towers and special powers at your command.

Fight on forests and wastelands, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower, special power, and Extractor upgrades and specializations! Bring your enemies death from above, send them moving backwards using Wind, place Mines in their way, block their way with a Decoy, or even Freeze them.

name: Rolling Adventure
description:
Drive with precision, jump and speed up your way on this exiting conveyor-belt platformer. Explore with care and close attention, the handcrafted puzzles filled with the hardest challenges.

Rolling adventure is a *VERY HARD* highly-addictive hard-core tight platformer with a unique twist, you drive over a conveyor belt with a beautiful procedurally generated environment.

name: Rage of Destiny
description: Rage of Destiny takes place in a western-fantasy world with stunning visuals and audio. Heroes with distinct personalities, spectacular maps and graphics, and immersive battles! Experience an HD sword and sorcery world on your mobile device! Busy with work and other activities? Earn EXP and rewards by being AFK! Enjoy the thrill of leveling up! Change your formation, switch your positions, strategize, and turn the tide in battles! Collect unique Heroes, and explore various skills and strategies! Team up Heroes as you like, and form your favorite squad! Random buildings, random items, random events... Sandbox gameplay with random elements to bring you a different experience every time you play the dungeon!

name: Maneater: Truth Quest
description: Maneater: Truth Quest DLC takes players to a brand-new island off the coast of Port Clovis – and comes packed with new evolutions, challenges, wildlife, and more! Players will once again take control of the apex predator of the sea to Eat, Explore and Evolve their way to the top of the food chain.

name: Beyond Mankind: The Awakening
description: Beyond Mankind: The Awakening is an Action RPG taking place in a post-apocalyptic world. The game sports a mature and deep narrative, rich exploration, tense combat, and immersive RPG mechanics.

name: Don't Touch this Button!
description: Don't Touch this Button! is a minimalistic puzzle game with a first-person point of view.

name: Tricks Magician
description: Tricks Magician is a game about a magician who has been trapped in an alternate reality because of his assistant rabbit's revenge, and now must overcome several challenges with a defying gravity and return to your normal world.

name: The Frosts: First Ones
description:
An adventure about searching for a missing hunter and meeting with alien beings!
Explore wild nature, follow the friend's trail, climb on a rock, lure out a boar, meet a wolf, survive in a rockfall. Heal a deer and trick a creature!
Meet the Unknown!

name: Suit for Hire
description: Shoot and toss enemies around in this top-down arcade shooter, cause mayhem and fight using your gun-fu and martial arts to reach the best scores possible.

name: Junkpunk: Arena
description: Junkpunk Arena is an arena combat game in which the player controls robots that they designed from various pieces of junk. The gameplay consists entirely of online competitive multiplayer in which the player's robots are pitted against each other.

name: Hexagon Knockout
description: Hexagon Knockout is a multiplayer bumper car game where the objective is to knock out your opponents. You control a vehicle capable of firing rockets using its cannon at the rear. Play all the different game modes, offline as well as online.

name: The Colorful Creature
description: A difficult platformer with the main mechanic of changing color in order to stand on colored blocks to progress. Play over 200 levels with unique items with diverse gameplay that have many items and hazards, in-game level editor, local multiplayer, endless run, customizable skins & hats, and more!

name: Opus: Echo of Starsong
description: Echo of Starsong is a Narrative puzzle adventure game. Eda, a girl who can hear mysterious sound waves known as starsong, crosses paths with a young man in search of their source. Together, they venture out to the heart of space to unravel an ancient myth.

name: A Curse from Beyond
description: A text-based cosmic horror adventure game

name: Prinny Presents: NIS Classics Vol 1 - Deluxe Edition
description:
For the first time ever, both Phantom Brave and Soul Nomad & the World Eaters are coming to Nintendo Switch! New and old fans alike can experience two classic titles from the NIS vault of RPG hits, complete with unique gameplay mechanics, memorable characters, up-scaled artwork, and all DLC from the original releases!

The Deluxe Edition includes:

- The Game
- Official Soundtrack
- Compendium Soft Cover Art Book
- Collector's Box

name: Rail of Möbius
description: Our protagonist WuShi and his friends are onboard a highspeed rail train, which is a tourist attraction that goes through the belly of the sea. What they do not know is that once upon a time, the train is a vehicle for time travel experience.

name: Classic Racers Elite
description: There was a time when pilots were TRUE pilots. It was the 60's. The time of Rock'n'Roll, movie stars and iconic cars. Drive furiously fast on gorgeous landscapes and fight against your monstrous car. A pure Time Attack game where you're driving cars from the "Gentlemen Drivers" era.

name: Phantom Brave: The Hermuda Triangle Remastered
description:
In the year of 913, in a world called Ivoire, lives Marona, a 13 year old orphaned girl with a special ability to communicate with phantoms. Her ability brings resentment from others, but cheerful and optimistic Marona is not bothered.

Marona believes in her parents' teachings that people will one day come to like her as long as she stays compassionate and kind. Now Marona travels throughout Ivoire with her guardian, "Ash the Phantom," to resolve disputes around the world.

name: Prinny Presents: NIS Classics Vol 1
description: For the first time ever, both Phantom Brave and Soul Nomad & the World Eaters are coming to Nintendo Switch! New and old fans alike can experience two classic titles from the NIS vault of RPG hits, complete with unique gameplay mechanics, memorable characters, up-scaled artwork, and all DLC from the original releases!

name: Monster Harvest
description: Monster Harvest is a monster collecting and farming action RPG with a twist! Grow, collect and mutate your crops then take them into battle! Filled with places to discover and multiple ways to build your farm, get ready to craft, explore and battle across the vibrant world of Planimal Point.

name: Vilset
description: Vilset is a strategic simulator based on the principle of survival of people, who turned out to be beyond the limits of their civilization.

name: Song of Iron
description: Song of Iron is a moody and provoking action adventure. A dive into a dark Nordic world full of mystery and danger. Your journey will take you far across the land of myths toward the home of the gods. Fight your way through man, monster and nature itself to reach the end.

name: The Big Con
description: Flex your inner teenager in The Big Con, an adventure game where you hustle across the country as a teen trying to save your family video store. In classic 90s con movie style, you'll get to persuade and pilfer your way to greatness using a whack of potential grifts.

name: Guts 'n Goals
description: Guts 'N Goals is an online multiplayer game where you can beat your friends in a soccer match, literally. Choose between 20+ different heroes with unique abilities and score goals by hitting a ball with a bat. You can also hit your enemies to knockdown them to get advantage.

name: Star Wars Rebels: Chopper Chase
description: Chopper chase is a browser game where you play as Chopper and help the rebels crew fix the ship or do other tasks.

name: Brawl Stars: Once Upon A Brawl
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Exe One More Time
description: Created by Mr Pixel Productions, One More Time is a new, more graphic take on the original Sonic.EXE creepypasta.

name: Mythia
description: A sci-fi mystery interactive fiction game. Figure out what your mysterious dream means; discover the truth of MYTHIA.

name: Schism
description:
Continuing the tradition of modernizing Doom, Schism brings its own unique and innovative twists. Through six years of development, it has seen massive upgrades which have, in their own right, bolstered the game to something much more than most of other Brutal Doom based projects.

New classes have been added, such as the Paladin — bestowed with improved renditions of a few of Hexen's iconic relics, as well as other new and absolutely savage melee weapons — and the Sorcerer — a master elementalist with an all-obliterating, wide array of magics that make the BFG9000 look utterly flaccid. The classic UAC Marine recieved multiple new firearms designed to round out his arsenal. All classes can use firearms, though only the UAC Marine can use all of them. Despite these massively powerful additions, Schism is not a power fantasy. New, much more dangerous foes await the heroes, while the pre-existing roster was rebalanced.

name: Uprising
description:
Uprising is a narrative driven DOOM2 megawad for limit removing ports (tested on Crispy Doom). It features an extensive dehacked patch with changes to weapons and monsters, alongside varied maps and gameplay. You'll be fighting through wastelands, abandoned facilities, hellish installations, ruined cities, frozen techbases and beyond...

The intended difficulity is UV but all other skills are implemented. There is something for everyone, including maps dripping with atmosphere, non linear keyhunts, short shootouts, frantic slaughter and a few true epics. Don't worry if you're intimidated, the largest fights have been inundated with powerups on the lower difficulties to allow the budding tourist to explore safely.

name: BioCrisis
description:
A Resident Evil inspired classic survival horror with PS1 style pre-rendered graphics and tank controls!

Straight out of the 90’s gameplay with a fresh feel!

name: Cosplay Therapy
description: Naughty parody game about cosplay

name: Murders on Budapest
description: Doyle, lost in a blizzard, is offered shelter at a grand estate. But when he tries to leave, a murder occurs. Who is the killer? Could it be ... me?! Enough with predictable mysteries! Try the comic murder mystery Murders on Budapest and choose your own mystery. Whoever you think the killer is, you're in for a surprise.

name: Enemies
description: Venturing into the exciting work of Lollygag Labs, a game developing corporation looking to breach the barriers of what can be achieved with gaming, then things take a dark turn...get ready to jump into the crazy world of ENEMIES!

name: Dragon Village NEW
description: Sin descripción

name: World Champions: Decathlon
description: World Champs is a series of retro style sports games for whole Family. Includes all favorite disciplines: 100 m, Long jump, Shot put, High jump, 400 m, 110 m hurdles, Discus throw, Pole vault, Javelin throw and 1500 m. Compete with time in Single Player or in PvP Mode both - Online and Local!

name: Mix Hentai Girls
description: Puzzle game to relax and enjoy your life in the best manner

name: Auto Cell: Game of Life
description: Auto Cell run in a two-dimensional grid world. Each grid can be regarded as a small life. It has two states: survival or death.

name: Evil God Land
description: A well-designed 3d fairy, defense, immortality, element, class game Rich weapons, props, and gameplay

name: Jewel Match Solitaire: Summertime
description: Summer, Sun, and Solitaire! Grab some cards and keep cool in the shade. It’s time for a picnic and a game of Solitaire! Jewel Match turns up the heat with this Solitaire Summer Edition. Travel the lands and explore more than 300 levels, restoring 5 beautiful summer escapes!

name: Need More Troops
description: Inspired by traditional turn-based fantasy strategies and modern auto battlers, we created the fast-paced rogue-lite game about growing a huge army against ever-increasing hordes of enemies. You should act wisely, though: the formation and battle plan are just as important as the army's size!

name: Mysterious warrior
description: Mysterious warrior - Introduces a 2D action platformer adventure. You have to play as a mystical warrior, carry out the orders of the servants of the deity and destroy the evil spirits that have infected this world.

name: X-Force Genesis
description: This game that brings back all the charm of shmup games from the 80s/90s. X-Force Genesis is a frantic and chaotic space shooter created from big and beautiful graphics with insane boss battles. Embark on epic battles and stop enemies from establishing a military base in orbit around X-planet

name: RealityMinds
description: A young aspiring soldier and a mysterious girl switch bodies. An RPG with a ripple effect that changes the minds of everyone involved.

name: Tar Alterra Adventure Game
description: 3rd person, single player, melee combat, Tar Alterra Adventure Game tells a story of an everyday hero trying to make his way home in this hack and slash crazy adventure game. Start the end of the world, or live out your days searching for a lost artifact that holds the key to your return home.

name: Rising: Hungry Lizard
description: Play a lizard aiming to survive in a dangerous natural world. Dedicate yourself entirely to sacrificing the flux of time for the right moment.

name: Alone on Mars
description:
Alone on Mars is a 2D survival shooter on Mars.
An SOS signal was sent from Mars, which was captured by your spacecraft.
You decide to change your course and travel to the planet to figure out what happened.
Upon arrival, you notice that each space station is home to incomprehensible
creatures that appear to have attacked the expeditionary groups and they were
forced to send this signal. Did any of them survive? Are there any traces
their presence? What does the expeditionary program to visit Mars hide?

The gameplay is a platformer with a mixture of sandbox and Tower Defense.
Defend the generator, unlock new weapons and solve the riddle of Mars.

name: Physarum: Slime Mold Simulator
description: PHYSARUM is a sandbox simulation game. Simulate the real world slime mold Physarum polycephalum by generating millions of living particles. Create and mutate slime species in real time to discover countless mesmerizing and emergent patterns.

name: Rollem.io
description: Skill-based fast-paced hamster racing MMO!

name: Epic Fantasy Battle Simulator
description: Welcome to Epic Fantasy Battle Simulator, the most immersive medieval battle simulator to date! Throw tens of thousands of soldiers into battle, enjoy the show, or take control of one of them to prove your valor! The only limit is your imagination! Or maybe your CPU?

name: The Curse of Feldar Vale
description: Can your party lift the curse that has befallen the once peaceful Vale? An adventure for 4-6 characters of Level 1-3, loosely based on Dungeons and Dragons Open Game License (OGL 1e/2e).

name: Puzzledorf
description: An elegant, block-pushing puzzle game with clean design, exploring the question, "What makes a good puzzle?" Set across multiple, beautiful worlds.

name: SafeZoneVR
description: SafeZoneVR is a VR interactive survival horror game. Players will scavenge the map trying to escape a fallen SafeZone once strong and bustling as the survivors flocked to it.

name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Red Gauntlet - Battlepack
description: Red Gauntlet Battlepack includes 9 scenarios from the first probes by Soviet infantry to the ultimate, desperate clash for the Important road and Bridges. This is modern street fighting., in the buildings, on the deck of the tanks.

name: Endo
description: Endo is a whimsical adventure with a focus on physical interaction. Embark on a surreal adventure set in an abstract psychedelic landscape, accompanied by original art, music and sound.

name: In Search of Fon Vitae
description: "In Search of Fon Vitae" is a mix of roguelike and exploration adventure in a procedural generated pirate themed world.

name: Disillusion
description: An odd tower filled with odd characters in lands you don't remember ever existed. almost like it's a dream? A first-person dungeon crawling RPG with an emphasis on interacting with the characters around you. Heavily inspired by other games such as LSD dream emulator, eastern mind lost souls, amongst others.

name: Clid the Snail
description: A dark fable about a grumpy humanoid snail armed to the teeth. A Top-Down Shooter focused on narrative and a mindful combat system.

name: Tinytopia
description: Imagine a world of your own creation... in miniature form! In Tinytopia use charming toy-like structures to design your ideal city. Build a quaint town and grow it into a soaring metropolis.

name: Mecha Knights: Nightmare
description:
Mecha action shooter, plunging the player into an apocalyptic war. Engage in epic battles with endless hordes of monsters in your powerful customizable mechs.

See the story through the eyes of an ace pilot. Fight for humanity’s survival through 20 campaign missions, working as a part of the N.A.T.O forces. Be part of large-scale operations, pushing your Mobile Armors to the brink of their capabilities. Choose your Mech and engage hundreds of bizarre creatures in epic battles, gaining weapons, equipment and resources along the way to upgrade and customize your Mech.

Engage the enemy on your terms! Develop an all-round Mech, built to do everything at once, or specialize it, allowing for devastating long-range barrages of high-velocity guns, or get up close with flame throwers and double-gatling guns. Choose from among a wide variety of mechs and weapons. Customize over 20 elements of your Mobile armour. Equip unique parts such as mine throwers, air support modules or weapon cooling systems.

name: LEGO Star Wars Battles
description: Lead an army of LEGO Star Wars characters into real-time multiplayer PvP battles in arenas inspired by iconic locations from throughout the galaxy! Collect and upgrade LEGO Star Wars characters, troops, and vehicles and craft formidable light and dark side armies. Build LEGO towers on the battlefield to strategically attack, defend, and capture territory as you push towards the enemy base to claim victory.

name: Trash Sailors
description: Trash Sailors is a survival couch co-op adventure game for up to two players. Enter a ruined world full of danger and junk that was left after the great flood. Cooperate with your companion to overcome obstacles, defeat enemies and try to survive.

name: KeyWe
description:
KeyWe is a cute, co-operative postal puzzler starring Jeff and Debra, two small kiwi birds working in a whimsical post office. They must jump, flap, peck and butt-slam their way across an interactive landscape of levers, bells and buttons to get those messages delivered on time!

Encounter perilous postal environments and navigate seasonal hazards while waddling through the Telepost’s various mail rooms, and partner up with a pal to help these adorable kiwis complete their tasks, whatever the weather. Unlock new accessories to customise your kiwi and become the best-dressed mail bird in Bungalow Basin.

name: Down the Drain
description: Down the Drain is 32 vanilla maps for Doom 2 and is my take on a Hell on Earth replacement with no added assets except midis that I like and bad menu gfx. Difficulty settings, coop, and deathmatch are implemented.

name: ZJ the Ball: Level 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiger Soldier I: MP033
description: Tiger Soldier is a military-themed run & gun shooter game. Playing as a lone soldier, first by fighting off infantry units and battling tanks then lob a hand grenade into the enemy's fort. Destroy the enemy's fort to clear game. The DLC include mission pack 033.

name: The Virtual Museum of Dead-Wifery
description: Meet Mrs. Groan- in exciting color. The didactic meets the sensational when "America's Favoritest Little Dead Wife 2008" explores the moral perils of "Wife Gaming"- taking viewers on an odyssey filled with lessons sure to make you laugh and cry.

name: The Angry 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Eyeball-watching flowers bloom
description: A small puzzle game about cultivating flowers.

name: The Button
description: A short game about finding your true self

name: Dice Paradise
description:
Dice Paradise is an aesthetically pleasing and relaxing dice-based puzzle game - so simple to pick up - the problem is putting it down again!
Clear the dice by matching rows on the board. Match dice of the same value, straights, or combos of both if you're getting fancy!
